description: This file implements functions related to generating unique identifiers using cryptographic sources, including the 'nanoid' library components such as 'nanoid', 'customAlphabet', 'customRandom', and exports 'urlAlphabet' and 'random'. It manages an internal pool of randomness to optimize performance and provides mechanisms to generate IDs with customizable alphabets and sizes.

methods.name: fillPool
methods.description: Fills or refills the internal randomness pool buffer based on the required byte size, managing buffer reallocation and randomness generation.

methods.name: random
methods.description: Generates a subarray of random bytes of specified length from the internal pool.

methods.name: customRandom
methods.description: Creates a function that generates unique IDs of a given size using a specified alphabet and a custom random source, leveraging bitmasking and optimized byte reading for performance.

methods.name: customAlphabet
methods.description: Simplified interface to create a custom ID generator with a specified alphabet and size, using 'customRandom'.

methods.name: nanoid
methods.description: Generates a random ID string of default or specified size using a pool of cryptographically secure random bytes, mapped through a URL-safe alphabet.
